@Brad_WHU yeah. I can't see why the board are after him.
@WHUFC_News @WestHam_Info @MailSport such a shame that it had to end like this
@Brad_WHU yeah true. Can't see hull selling him and snodgrass to us though. Maybe when they go down.

@Brad_WHU @WestHam_Info whole reason Swansea went downhill because he left.
@jam1ema5on @dmyeo66 @ExWHUemployee yeah I said that all along too. Buy himself out of his contract if he wants to go so much
@BeepsMan @SkySportsNewsHQ wouldn't say disloyal. He came up with Southampton from league one. He is 33.2.5 year deal is better than 18month
@westhamtransfer think mark noble should of had a word with him.
@spz1899 @WestHam_Central he should show WH more respect and the fans. If he wants to go back for family reasons. Come out and say it.
@spz1899 @WestHam_Central you only want him back now we made him a star
@SlavanOut @GriMaHcs @robstanley_ he is proven with a big budget. Like pep is proven with the best teams.Our quality players now may not fit
@SlavanOut @GriMaHcs @robstanley_ who is out there that is realistically a better manager that is proven?
@SlavanOut @GriMaHcs @robstanley_ we need to back the man who is in charge and get behind him and the team. Otherwise what's the point
@SlavanOut @GriMaHcs @robstanley_ I don't think anyone knows who's fault it is. Because we don't no who is in charge of transfers.
@GriMaHcs @SlavanOut @robstanley_ is struggling to get Man City to compete. Well a lot of players are underperforming.
@GriMaHcs @SlavanOut @robstanley_ and has proven he is a good manager here and previous jobs. Premier league is the hardest league. Even pep
@GriMaHcs @SlavanOut @robstanley_ yeah we could be but to say that the manager is a problem is false. Not you said it.He is a well respected
@GriMaHcs @SlavanOut @robstanley_ West Ham over performed last season. Top teams underperformed. We are a mid table team on spending ability
@WHUFC_News @ExWHUemployee if he came out saying the reason why he wants to go. And actually spoke to the team it would be different
@loldeantimber half watching it and doing the utility room. Yeah but dad is big Sam lol

@Damo_84 I think you and I would be sacked if we didn't do our https://t.co/MHTx5HzXAe want to leave buy your contract out
@SmedleyTony @RobbieSavage8 great answer. I know we all would be sacked for doing what he is doing with our jobs
@Damo_84 if he wants to leave fine him for not doing his job, until he buys his contract out
@dimpayet17 @whufc_official you get paid Â£120k a week. It would take me 7 years to earn that. Yet fans like me pay your wages.
@dimpayet17 @whufc_official what has happened to you. All about the love affair continues. Grow some balls and do what your paid to do.
@ReadWestHam tombides would be better
@WHUFC_News that's only two weeks wages
@dimpayet17 @WHUFC_News @westhamtransfer @DaveSulley a potential West Ham great, turns into a West Ham ungrateful in a blink of an eye
@loldeantimber @dimpayet17 well I bet most players want to leave and go to better clubs but the is a way of doing it.
@thewesthamzone @WHUFC_News nah get big money from abroad or if he wants to leave get him to pay off his contract
@loldeantimber from being hero one season to being a cunt in a few months. @dimpayet17 your attitude is poor. Earn yourself a move.
@loldeantimber don't pay him or get him to pay off his contract if he wants to go so bad
@WHUFC_News don't pay him. If he is refusing to do his job. I would get sacked if I refused to do mine. Or get him to pay out his contracts
@dimpayet17 one simple answer do you want to leave West Ham?
@WHUFC_News @Moncz97 he needs to demand the ball like he did last season.taking the game by the scruff, like Sanchez would for Arsenal
@westhamtransfer we are in danger there are a few teams worse than us. But some have more spirit.
@TheGeeMan007 @WHUFC_News nah sell up players who don't want to try like payet. Lower teams players put in a shift. This lot are not
@ExWHUemployee he will do brilliant for us in championship next season.
@TheGeeMan007 @WHUFC_News it could be our only chance to stay in premier
@WHUFC_News we were playing well. Then penalty kicks us down.
@WHUFC_News what else is on tv?
@WHUFC_News should sign fonte

@ExWHUemployee @6_AaronLee pointless tweet. Says everything that everybody already knows
@WHUFC_News Defoe, dembele, hogan, gray, don't entertain batshuayi. Didn't want to come to us in summer rather sit on Chelsea bench
@westhamtransfer Â£10m maximum just cause of age. But for goals in premier to save a shocking season. Defoe guarantees them. Long is goal shy
@OnlyWayIsPayet @DaveSulley it is irrelevant. The 3 points have gone.?
@WHUFC_News @TheSunFootball dembele is better for sell on value. Gray isn't a natural finisher. Defoe for 2 seasons pay 10 mil is gd

@dimpayet17 if you want a move to a so called big club start putting a shift in for the players and club that made you great last season

@BlippiOfficial our house loves you songs and videos. Keeps my boys entertained and quiet for hours and they learn a lot from you.

@SkyFootball @westhamtransfer westham sign him up. Proper captain material
@BlippiOfficial everyday your videos are on in our house.The songs are very catchy too. You would do well in the U.K. Kids love the videos

@WHUFC_News it is worrying Last season over achieved same as the likes of Leicester and Spurs.lot of teams underachieved too. Even it out.
@WHUFC_News really like him. Works hard for the team

@ellingford_paul @S_D_C_C @WHUFC_News no one talking about the fans disgusting behaviour. Pay to watch football, not to go fighting.

@ClaretandH you have to spend to improve and compete with the bigger boys and aim to be one of the bigger boys
